title: Riot i tried to reinstall legaue and now i cant use it
body: so when i hit the launch button it pops up with "League of Legends has encountered a problem. Please re-install league alpha client to try again" how do i re-install plz help.

replies.body: It sounds like the installation for the updated client isn't going well.  You'll want to do a complete [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)of league.  You can try to update it again after, or stick to the legacy client for now.  Be sure to submit any reports to the client devs over at the client discussion boards.  Hope that helps!
